hackathon-description-text: LoRaWAN IoT news and applications have been coming on thick and heavy because this IoT standard promises low-cost implementation, rapid scalability and economic operation. The technology, supporting business and community applications are bursting.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the wining team will be awarded one LORA®-ENABLED GATEWAY.  Teams can not exceed 4 members.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3101 Market St, Philadelphia, PA 19104, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Provide innovative solutions -innovate using the tech stacks provided.

Keep in mind that you are innovating with a stack that includes hardware, applications and data. So innovate in all areas.
Clearly identify the problems being solved & demonstrate the how your project will solve your issue.
Degree of technical complexity. Keep in mind that you are working with hardware, software and data.

hackathon-description-header: Learn and hack on LoRa enabled IoT projects.
